project.name: Maven xdoc Plugin
project.title: Download page
project.body:
download latest binary all-in-one jetty integrated jar file
run it with "java -jar web-cellHTS2-standalone.jar"
start it in a webbrowser with "http://localhost:8080"
Please note: if you want to change the folder for uploading your temp files
use property : upload-path
e.g. java -Dupload-path=/tmp/cellTMP -jar web-cellHTS2-standalone.jar
Please Note second:
It should be possible to run the standalone version on a windows machine too such as
java -Dupload-path=C:/temp -jar web-cellHTS2-standalone.jar
The web Interface loads fine on a windows machine
but we never installed R and Rserve on a Windows machine (but it should be possible too)
click me
